General.Name: Jiangsu Kuangshun Photosensitivity New-Material Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Kuangshun Photosensitivity New-Material Stock Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells inks and coatings in China. The company offers photosensitive inks, liquid photosensitive solder resist inks, UV curing solder resist inks, UV curable marking inks, heat curing solder resist inks, heat curing marking inks, UV curable acid and etch resistant inks, UV curing coatings, and other materials. It also provides 3C vibration wear-resistant combination, recommendation, cosmetic combination recommendation, and recommended combination of classic color-adding two-coat real plating solutions. Jiangsu Kuangshun Photosensitivity New-Material Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Jiangyin, China.
General.Address: No. 18, Hua Cheng Road, Jiangyin, China, 214401
